text: (ivvivaram aracarukku arivikkappattatum) avarai ennitam alaittu varunkal" enru aracar kurinar; (avarutaiya) tutar yusuhpitam vantapotu avar, "nir um ejamanaritam tirumpic cenru, 'tam kaikalai vettikkonta penkalin unmai nilai enna?' Enru avaritam kelum. Niccayamaka en iraivan appenkalin catiyai nanku arintavanaka irukkinranan" enru kurinar
